		<h2>We are sorry but the page you are looking for is no longer available.</h2>
		<p>This may be because there has been some recent reorganisation of this website. Please go to the Language Centre <a href="lc/index.html"><strong>Home page</strong></a> or follow the links above to the appropriate section of the website to locate the information you require.</p>

		<h2>We are sorry but the page you are looking for is no longer available.</h2>
		<p>This may be because there has been some recent reorganisation of this website. Please go to the Language Centre <a href="lc/index.html"><strong>Home page</strong></a> or follow the links above to the appropriate section of the website to locate the information you require.</p>

		<h2>We are sorry but the page you are looking for is no longer available.</h2>
		<p>This may be because there has been some recent reorganisation of this website. Please go to the Language Centre <a href="lc/index.html"><strong>Home page</strong></a> or follow the links above to the appropriate section of the website to locate the information you require.</p>

		<h2>We are sorry but the page you are looking for is no longer available.</h2>
		<p>This may be because there has been some recent reorganisation of this website. Please go to the Language Centre <a href="lc/index.html"><strong>Home page</strong></a> or follow the links above to the appropriate section of the website to locate the information you require.</p>

		<h2>We are sorry but the page you are looking for is no longer available.</h2>
		<p>This may be because there has been some recent reorganisation of this website. Please go to the Language Centre <a href="lc/index.html"><strong>Home page</strong></a> or follow the links above to the appropriate section of the website to locate the information you require.</p>

<div class="campl-column6">
            <div class="campl-content-container">

<p>The web resource you requested requires you to identify yourself <a
href="/help/raven.html" class="helplink" target="_blank" title="Help on Raven authentication">[Help -
why am I seeing this?]</a>.  This resource
is provided by the website <span class="url">www.langcen.cam.ac.uk</span>.
You should only proceed if you are happy to be identified to this site.
</p>

<p><strong>Always</strong> quit your web browser when you have finished
accessing services that require authentication. Do not disclose your
password to anyone. Please report attempts to obtain your password in unusual
circumstances. Raven necessarily uses cookies to manage your authentication
(<a href="/privacy.html#cookie">details</a>).</p>

<p>See <a href="/help/accounts.html" class="helplink" target="_blank"
title="Help on Raven accounts">help on Raven accounts</a> if you want to
change the password you use to log in to Raven, if your password isn't
working, or if you don't have a Raven account but need one.</p>

		<h2>We are sorry but the page you are looking for is no longer available.</h2>
		<p>This may be because there has been some recent reorganisation of this website. Please go to the Language Centre <a href="lc/index.html"><strong>Home page</strong></a> or follow the links above to the appropriate section of the website to locate the information you require.</p>

                      <h3><a href="#">John Trim Centre Opening Hours</a></h3>
                      <h6><a href="#">During Full Term</a></h6>
					<ul class="campl-unstyled-list campl-page-children">
						<li><a href="#">Monday-Friday:  9am - 7pm.</a>

                        <h6><a href="#">Outside Full Term  &amp; after Easter Term teaching weeks
                        </a></h6>
                     <ul class="campl-unstyled-list campl-page-children">
						<li><a href="#">Monday-Friday:  9am - 5pm
                        </a>

                      </ul>

      <!-- Main content starts -->	
				<div class="campl-column6  campl-main-content">
				  <img src="images/adtis-recessed-24.jpg" alt="Collaborations" class="campl-scale-with-grid" />
				  <div class="campl-content-container">
                    <h2>Careers Service</h2>
                    <h3>Careers Service Language Referrals </h3>
                    <h4><strong>The Language of CVs and Cover Letters (for International Students)</strong></h4>
                    <p>The language and style of CVs and cover letters can be tricky even when English is your first language. But when English isn’t your mother tongue it can be all the more difficult, due to the conventions of writing applications in the UK. If you’d like to review the language of your CV or cover letter once you have spoken to a Careers Adviser about its contents, then simply book a half-hour, one-to-one appointment with one of our advisers. </p>
                    <p>Appointments are available on Friday mornings during term-time at the Language Centre. You should first consult a Careers Adviser, who will review the content of your CV and cover letter. You will then be able to register for this service. <br>
                    </p>
                    <p><strong><span class="campl-icon campl-info-icon"></span>Please note the following prerequisite: students <em><u>must</u></em> have been referred by the University Careers Service.</strong></p>
                    <hr />
                    <a  class="campl-float-right" href="#top"><img class="camp1-btn" src="../images/interface/bg-vertical-breadcrumb-up-arrow.png" alt="Back to top"></a>                    
				    <h4>Language and Style of Personal Statements and Research Proposals </h4>
<p>Are you applying for graduate study, a scholarship or a postdoc? Do you feel you need advice on the language and style of your personal statement or research proposal? </p>
<p>Have your application reviewed by a Senior Teaching Officer from the Academic Development and Training for International Students (ADTIS) team. This review will then be followed by a one-hour, one-to-one appointment with an ADTIS adviser.</p>
<p><em>Cost: £25.00 </em></p>
<p><strong><span class="campl-icon campl-info-icon"></span>To register for this service, email your name and crsid to: <a href="mailto:adtis@langcen.cam.ac.uk">adtis@langcen.cam.ac.uk</a>.</strong></p>
<h4>FAQs </h4>
<p><strong>Q</strong>: Who is this service for? </p>
<p><strong>A</strong>: It is for those applying to post-graduate study, scholarships or post-docs. </p>
<p><strong>Q</strong>: When is this service available? </p>
<p><strong>A</strong>: It is available in term-time only. </p>
<p><strong>Q</strong>: What form do appointments take? </p>
<p><strong>A</strong>: Appointments are one-to-one and last one hour. </p>
<p><strong>Q</strong>: What kinds of documents can my adviser review? </p>
<p><strong>A</strong>: Your adviser can review: personal statements, research proposals, scholarship applications, statements of interest and purpose. </p>
<p><strong>Q</strong>: Will my adviser edit or proofread my documents? </p>
<p><strong>A</strong>: No. The purpose of these appointments is to advise you on the use of appropriate language and style. You are responsible for all content, and are expected to edit and proofread your own work. </p>
<p><strong><span class="campl-icon campl-info-icon"></span>If you have any further questions, email: <a href="mailto:adtis@langcen.cam.ac.uk">adtis@langcen.cam.ac.uk</a>.</strong></p>
<hr />
                    <a  class="campl-float-right" href="#top"><img class="camp1-btn" src="../images/interface/bg-vertical-breadcrumb-up-arrow.png" alt="Back to top"></a>
                    <h3>Coaching </h3>
                    <p> Do you wish to build stronger personal or study skills, or to enhance an aspect of your academic performance? Realise and work to your full potential with individual or group ADTIS Coaching sessions. </p>
                    <p>Drawing on our Personal and Study Skills (PASS) Coaching programme for in-sessional students, ADTIS is now offering tailored, skills-based support in a range of areas such as: organisation and time management; working effectively in groups; overcoming anxiety; beating study block and procrastination; building assertiveness; confident communication; and active listening. </p>
                    <p>ADTIS Coaching will help you to make better sense of your abilities, and will equip you with skills and techniques to use both in your academic life and beyond. </p>
					<p><strong><span class="campl-icon campl-info-icon"></span>To learn more about how ADTIS Coaching could help you, contact: <a href="mailto:adtis@langcen.cam.ac.uk">adtis@langcen.cam.ac.uk</a>.                    
                    <p><hr />
                    <a  class="campl-float-right" href="#top"><img class="camp1-btn" src="../images/interface/bg-vertical-breadcrumb-up-arrow.png" alt="Back to top"></a>
</div></div><div class="campl-column3 campl-secondary-content">

		<h2>We are sorry but the page you are looking for is no longer available.</h2>

		<h2>We are sorry but the page you are looking for is no longer available.</h2>
		<p>This may be because there has been some recent reorganisation of this website. Please go to the Language Centre <a href="lc/index.html"><strong>Home page</strong></a> or follow the links above to the appropriate section of the website to locate the information you require.</p>

            	<div class="campl-content-container">

		<h2>We are sorry but the page you are looking for is no longer available.</h2>
		<p>This may be because there has been some recent reorganisation of this website. Please go to the Language Centre <a href="lc/index.html"><strong>Home page</strong></a> or follow the links above to the appropriate section of the website to locate the information you require.</p>

            	<div class="campl-content-container">

		<h2>We are sorry but the page you are looking for is no longer available.</h2>
		<p>This may be because there has been some recent reorganisation of this website. Please go to the Language Centre <a href="lc/index.html"><strong>Home page</strong></a> or follow the links above to the appropriate section of the website to locate the information you require.</p>

		<h2>We are sorry but the page you are looking for is no longer available.</h2>
		<p>This may be because there has been some recent reorganisation of this website. Please go to the Language Centre <a href="lc/index.html"><strong>Home page</strong></a> or follow the links above to the appropriate section of the website to locate the information you require.</p>

            	<div class="campl-content-container">

		<h2>We are sorry but the page you are looking for is no longer available.</h2>
		<p>This may be because there has been some recent reorganisation of this website. Please go to the Language Centre <a href="lc/index.html"><strong>Home page</strong></a> or follow the links above to the appropriate section of the website to locate the information you require.</p>

		<h2>We are sorry but the page you are looking for is no longer available.</h2>
		<p>This may be because there has been some recent reorganisation of this website. Please go to the Language Centre <a href="lc/index.html"><strong>Home page</strong></a> or follow the links above to the appropriate section of the website to locate the information you require.</p>

  <div class="campl-wrap clearfix campl-page-sub-title campl-recessed-sub-title">
			<div class="campl-column12">
				<div class="campl-content-container">
                    <h1 class="campl-sub-title">Academic Development and Training for International Students (ADTIS)</h1>
				</div>
			</div>
	  </div>
	</div>
<!-- Main Local Title ends -->
		<div class="campl-row campl-content campl-recessed-content">            
			<div class="campl-wrap clearfix">
				<div class="campl-column9 campl-recessed-carousel">
					<div class="section-carousel campl-carousel clearfix campl-banner">
						<div class="campl-carousel-container">
							<ul class="campl-unstyled-list campl-slides">

								<li class="campl-slide campl-column12">
									<div class="image-container">
									<a href="http://lcitc.langcen.cam.ac.uk/english/elo/plagiarism/index.html">
										<img  src="images/carousel-34.png" alt="Online Courseware: Plagiarism and how to avoid it" class="campl-scale-with-grid" title="Online Courseware: Plagiarism and how to avoid it" />
									</a>
	                </div>
									<div class="campl-slide-caption"><span class="campl-slide-caption-txt">Online Courseware: Plagiarism and how to avoid it</span></div>
								</li>
								<li class="campl-slide campl-column12">
									<div class="image-container">
									<a href="pdf/In-Sessional-Flyer.pdf">
									<img alt="In-Sessional Leaflet" title="In-Sessional Leaflet" src="images/carousel-35.png" class="campl-scale-with-grid" />
									</a>
              </div>

									<div class="campl-slide-caption"><span class="campl-slide-caption-txt">Pre-Sessional 2018: Course and Accommodation Information

</span></div>
								</li>                                                             
							</ul>
						</div>

	<div class="campl-row campl-content campl-recessed-content" >
	  <div class="campl-wrap clearfix">
			<div class="campl-column9 campl-main-content">      
<div class="campl-column4 campl-main-content">
		<div class="campl-content-container"> 

							<div class="campl-vertical-teaser campl-teaser"> 
                            	 
								<div class="campl-content-container campl-vertical-teaser-img"> 
									<a href="adtis-overview-courses.html" class="campl-teaser-img-link"><img alt="Overview of Taught Courses"  src="images/homepage-teaser-01.png" class="campl-scale-with-grid" /></a>
						    </div>
							  <div class="campl-content-container campl-vertical-teaser-txt">
								<h3 class='campl-teaser-title'><a href="adtis-overview-courses.html">Overview of Taught Courses</a></h3>
								<p>The ADTIS section runs two main academic language and  communication skills programmes as well as bespoke workshops/short courses for  Departments and Colleges.<br /><br /></p>
<a href="adtis-overview-courses.html" class="campl-primary-cta">Read more</a>
								</div>
					</div>	
				</div>  
<div class="campl-content-container"> 
							<div class="campl-vertical-teaser campl-teaser"> 
								<div class="campl-content-container campl-vertical-teaser-img">
									<a href="bespoke-workshops.html" class="campl-teaser-img-link"><img alt="External Courses"  src="images/homepage-teaser-16.png" class="campl-scale-with-grid" /></a>
				        </div>
								<div class="campl-content-container campl-vertical-teaser-txt">
								  <h3 class="campl-teaser-title"><a href="bespoke-workshops.html">Bespoke Provision</a></h3>
								  <p>In response to an increasing number of ad-hoc requests from departments and colleges to run tailored workshops for them on their sites, we are planning a more formalised and flexible offering of development and training workshops.</p>
								  <a href="bespoke-workshops.html" class="campl-primary-cta">Read more</a>
							  </div>
							</div>	
					</div>
                    <div class="campl-content-container"> 
							<div class="campl-vertical-teaser campl-teaser"> 
								<div class="campl-content-container campl-vertical-teaser-img">
									<a href="adtis-external.html" class="campl-teaser-img-link"><img alt="External Courses"  src="images/homepage-teaser-03.png" class="campl-scale-with-grid" /></a>
				        </div>
								<div class="campl-content-container campl-vertical-teaser-txt">
									<h3 class='campl-teaser-title'><a href="adtis-external.html">External Courses</a></h3>
									<p>In addition to our own taught courses, we also run a course for  the Institute of Continuing Education’s International Summer School and offer a  range of academic development workshops for the China UK Development Council  (CUDC).</p>
									<a href="adtis-external.html" class="campl-primary-cta">Read more</a>
								</div>
							</div>	
					</div> 	                  	
        			                                               
			</div>
            
            
			<div class="campl-column4 campl-main-content">
        			<div class="campl-content-container"> 
							<div class="campl-vertical-teaser campl-teaser"> 
								<div class="campl-content-container campl-vertical-teaser-img">
									<a href="adtis-assessment.html" class="campl-teaser-img-link"><img alt="Assessements Procedures"  src="images/homepage-teaser-02.png" class="campl-scale-with-grid" /></a>
						    </div>
								<div class="campl-content-container campl-vertical-teaser-txt">
									<h3 class='campl-teaser-title'><a href="adtis-assessment.html">Assessment Procedures</a></h3>
									<p>The University's Language Centre carries out an average of  around 1,750 assessments of applicants' academic English literacy skills each  year for University entry. You find details about the assessments and how to  apply here.<strong></strong></p>
                                              <div class="campl-wrap clearfix"></div>
<a href="adtis-assessment.html" class="campl-primary-cta">Read more</a>
								</div>
 							</div>	
					</div>             

        			<div class="campl-content-container"> 
							<div class="campl-vertical-teaser campl-teaser"> 
								<div class="campl-content-container campl-vertical-teaser-img">
									<a href="adtis-collaborations.html" class="campl-teaser-img-link"><img alt="Collaborations & Consultancy"  src="images/homepage-teaser-14.png" class="campl-scale-with-grid" /></a>
					      </div>
							  <div class="campl-content-container campl-vertical-teaser-txt">
							    <h3 class="campl-teaser-title"><a href="adtis-collaborations.html">Collaborations and Consultancy</a></h3>
							    <p>ADTIS works in close collaboration with numerous bodies both within and outside Cambridge and it offers its expertise and services to numerous universities  and educational bodies around the world.<br /><br /></p>
                                          
<a href="adtis-collaborations.html" class="campl-primary-cta">Read more</a>

						      </div>

							</div>
                            </div>                    
<div class="campl-content-container"> 
							<div class="campl-vertical-teaser campl-teaser"> 
								<div class="campl-content-container campl-vertical-teaser-img">
									<a href="adtis-complaints.html" class="campl-teaser-img-link"><img  src="images/homepage-teaser-13.png" alt="Complaints Procedures" class="campl-scale-with-grid" /></a>
							  </div>
							  <div class="campl-content-container campl-vertical-teaser-txt">
								<h3 class='campl-teaser-title'><a href="adtis-complaints.html">Complaints Procedures</a></h3>
								  <p>The Language Centre is committed to high quality of educational and other provision  and encourages students to say where there is cause for concern.</p>
								  <p>&nbsp;<br /></p>
							  <a href="adtis-complaints.html" class="campl-primary-cta">Read more</a>
                                 </div>
							</div>	
					</div>                       				
			</div>			
            <div class="campl-column4 campl-main-content">
					<div class="campl-content-container"> 
							<div class="campl-vertical-teaser campl-teaser"> 
								<div class="campl-content-container campl-vertical-teaser-img">
									<a href="adtis-online-courseware.html" class="campl-teaser-img-link"><img alt="Online Courseware"  src="images/homepage-teaser-04.png" class="campl-scale-with-grid" /></a>
								</div>
							  <div class="campl-content-container campl-vertical-teaser-txt">
							    <h3 class='campl-teaser-title'><a href="adtis-online-courseware.html">Online Courseware</a></h3>
								  <p>The face-to-face teaching in ADTIS is complemented with specifically designed in-house online courseware.   
							    </p>
							    <p>&nbsp;<br /><br /></p>                             
<a href="adtis-online-courseware.html" class="campl-primary-cta">Read more</a>
							  </div></div></div>
                                                        	<div class="campl-content-container"> 
							<div class="campl-vertical-teaser campl-teaser"> 
								<div class="campl-content-container campl-vertical-teaser-img">
									<a href="adtis-advising.html" class="campl-teaser-img-link"><img  src="images/homepage-teaser-15.png" alt="Advising & Coaching" border="0" class="campl-scale-with-grid" /></a>
					      </div>
							  <div class="campl-content-container campl-vertical-teaser-txt">
								<h3 class='campl-teaser-title'><a href="adtis-advising.html">Advising and Coaching</a></h3>
								<p>ADTIS offers advising and coaching sessions on CVs and cover letters, personal statements and research proposals, or personal and academic skills enhancement. <br /><br /></p>
<a href="adtis-advising.html" class="campl-primary-cta">Read more</a>
                              </div>
							</div>	
						</div>              	                     					
<div class="campl-content-container"> 
							<div class="campl-vertical-teaser campl-teaser"> 
								<div class="campl-content-container campl-vertical-teaser-img"><a href="adtis-proofreading.html" class="campl-teaser-img-link"><a href="adtis-proofreading.html" class="campl-teaser-img-link"><img alt="Proofreading Procedures"  src="images/homepage-teaser-12.png" class="campl-scale-with-grid" /></a></div>
								<div class="campl-content-container campl-vertical-teaser-txt">
									<h3 class='campl-teaser-title'>Proofreading Procedures</h3>
									<p>The University’s Statement on Proofreading, drafted by the  Language Centre, sets out best practice guidelines regarding the proofreading  of all written work up to and including doctoral theses.<br /><br /></p>
<a href="adtis-proofreading.html" class="campl-primary-cta">Read more</a>
								</div>
							</div>	
					</div>

							<a href="http://www.cam.ac.uk/research/spotlight-on">Spotlight on...</a>
						</li>
						<li>
							<a href="http://www.cam.ac.uk/research/research-at-cambridge">About research at Cambridge</a>
						</li>
					</ul>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>

		<h2>We are sorry but the page you are looking for is no longer available.</h2>
		<p>This may be because there has been some recent reorganisation of this website. Please go to the Language Centre <a href="lc/index.html"><strong>Home page</strong></a> or follow the links above to the appropriate section of the website to locate the information you require.</p>

		<h2>We are sorry but the page you are looking for is no longer available.</h2>
		<p>This may be because there has been some recent reorganisation of this website. Please go to the Language Centre <a href="lc/index.html"><strong>Home page</strong></a> or follow the links above to the appropriate section of the website to locate the information you require.</p>

							<a href="http://www.cam.ac.uk/research/discussion">Discussion</a>
						</li>
						<li>
							<a href="http://www.cam.ac.uk/research/spotlight-on">Spotlight on...</a>
						</li>
						<li>
							<a href="http://www.cam.ac.uk/research/research-at-cambridge">About research at Cambridge</a>
						</li>
					</ul>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>	
</div>

		<h2>We are sorry but the page you are looking for is no longer available.</h2>
		<p>This may be because there has been some recent reorganisation of this website. Please go to the Language Centre <a href="lc/index.html"><strong>Home page</strong></a> or follow the links above to the appropriate section of the website to locate the information you require.</p>

		<h2>We are sorry but the page you are looking for is no longer available.</h2>
		<p>This may be because there has been some recent reorganisation of this website. Please go to the Language Centre <a href="lc/index.html"><strong>Home page</strong></a> or follow the links above to the appropriate section of the website to locate the information you require.</p>

    <h2>Latest News</h2>

    <div class="campl-content-container campl-vertical-teaser-txt">
      <div class="campl-highlight-date-container"> <span class="campl-highlight-date"><span class="campl-highlight-day">13</span>0ct</span></div>
      <p class='campl-listing-title'>Welcome</p>
      <div class="campl-content-container campl-vertical-teaser-txt clearfix">
        <p>Welcome  to the new <strong>Academic Development &amp;  Training for International Students</strong> website. We hope that the new format  will help you to find the information you are looking for quickly and easily –  whether you are looking to find out about our taught programmes or to find out  what you need to do to apply for an assessment. But you’ll also be able to find  out about everything else that we do.</p>

<!-- Secondary content / Latest news start -->
<div class="campl-content-container">
  <div class="campl-heading-container">
    <h2>Latest News</h2>
    </div>
  <div class="campl-content-container campl-vertical-teaser-txt">
    <div class="campl-content-container campl-vertical-teaser-txt">
      <!--<div class="campl-highlight-date-container"> <span class="campl-highlight-date"><span class="campl-highlight-day">13</span>jan</span></div> -->
      <p class="campl-listing-title">Welcome to the<strong> Advice &amp; Learning pages</strong></p>

<!-- Main content starts -->	
				<div class="campl-column6  campl-main-content" id="content">
				  <img src="../images/content/recessed-image-placeholder22.jpg" alt="Conversation Exchange" name="top" class="campl-scale-with-grid" />
				  <div class="campl-content-container"> <a href="conversation-exchange-form.html" target="_self"  id="top" class="campl-float-right"><img class="campl-float-right" src="../images/content/join.png" alt="Guidelines"></a>
                    <h2>Exchange Guidelines</h2>
                    <ol start="1" type="1">
                      <li>The sole purpose of the Conversation Exchange is to offer you an opportunity to practice your language skills.</li>
                      <li>Your name and email will be passed to your exchange partner. All other registration information is used only to allocate a suitable partner.</li>
                      <li>Once you have been assigned a partner, you are expected to contact him or her and to remain committed to the exchange.</li>
                      <li>It is the partners' responsibility to arrange meetings and keep up the guarantee one for you nor the suitability of the person selected.</li>
                      <li>If you wish to change partners please contact the coordinator.</li>
                      <li>Please inform the coordinator if you no longer wish to be considered for an exchange.</li>
                      <li>If your partner decides to end the exchange, you must not attempt to contact them further.</li>
                      <li>The Conversation Exchange coordinator should be contacted in case of problems.</li>
                      <li>The coordinator may contact you in confidence for feedback and monitoring purposes.</li>
                      <li>The coordinator should be contacted when you wish to leave, and all of your personal data will be deleted.</li>
                    </ol>
                    <hr>
                    <p>Now that you have read our Conversation Exchange Guidelines, clik on <a href="#top"><strong>Join</strong></a> to register. </p>                    
				  </div>
				</div>

<!-- Main content starts -->	
				<div class="campl-column6  campl-main-content" id="content">
				  <img src="../images/content/recessed-image-placeholder24.jpg" alt="Explore resources" class="campl-scale-with-grid" />
				  <div class="campl-content-container">
				    <h2>Explore resources</h2>
				    <h3>Resource Guide</h3>
				      <p><a href="../resources/resources-index.html"><strong>Our guide</strong></a> provides the comprehensive list of every resource  we have inside <strong>our learning centre</strong> (JTC), organised by language and by skill area. </p>

  <p><span class="campl-icon campl-info-icon"></span><a href="#" rel="tooltip" data-tooltip-text="In the guide we list a limited number of links to online learning resources external to the Language Centre. However, we collect many more of these and share them in advising appointments, as we do information about the Language Centre’s own online resources."><strong>External online resources</strong></a> </p>
  <hr \>
<h3>The John Trim Centre  for independent language learning</h3>
                      <p>As you can see from the resource guide, the <strong>JTC</strong> is a  treasure trove of 170+ languages, for Cambridge students, staff and <a href="../about/using-lc-resources.html"><strong>members of the  public</strong></a> to enjoy as a home-from-home for language learning. </p>
                    <p>The learning centre is dedicated to the memory of <strong>John Trim</strong> (1924-2013), a pioneer in the field of language education and the description  of language learning proficiency, whose work to establish the Common European  Framework of Reference as a tool for levelling competences aids language  educators worldwide today.  The <strong>JTC</strong> had its  origins in the Department of Applied Linguistics, where John was Head of Department  and during which time a small collection of materials began to take shape.</p>
                    <hr \>
                    <h3><strong>Ready to explore?</strong></h3>
                      <p><em><strong>Yes!</strong></em>  Then please feel free to come in any time to  use the learning centre, we are open 9am-7pm during term time, and close at 5pm  during the vacations.</p>
                      <p><em><strong>With a bit of support!</strong></em>  <strong><a href="learning.html#2">Appointments</a></strong>  to talk to a language learning adviser before, during or after your studies are  always available if you’d like a conversation about your learning.</p>
 <hr \>
				  </div>
				</div>

 				<div class="campl-content-container">             
                <div class="campl-column12">
                      <div class="campl-content-container campl-no-left-padding">
                        <blockquote class="clearfix">
                          <p class="campl-quote-mark">The JTC is like a language gym: use the equipment here to do your   training.  Or, to tone up off premises, we offer help with online   resources.</p>
                          <cite>The Advising Team</cite>
                        </blockquote>
                      </div>
                  </div>
 				</div>              
            </div>
			</div>
            </div>
   <!-- Secondary content / promo teasers end -->

		<div class="campl-row campl-content campl-recessed-content">
			<div class="campl-wrap clearfix">
				<div class="campl-column3">

						<ul class="campl-unstyled-list campl-vertical-breadcrumb">
							<li><a href="../index.html">The Language Centre <span class="campl-vertical-breadcrumb-indicator"></span></a></li>
						</ul>

								<li class="campl-selected"><a href="#">Advice and Learning</a>
									<ul class='campl-unstyled-list campl-vertical-breadcrumb-children'>
                        				<li><a href="advising-index.html">Overview</a></li>

<!-- Main content starts -->	
				<div class="campl-column6  campl-main-content" id="content">
				  <img src="../images/content/recessed-image-placeholder21.jpg" alt="" class="campl-scale-with-grid" />
				  <div class="campl-content-container">
				    <h2 id="1">How do you like to learn?</h2>
				    <p>Each year the Advising team works with a wide range of  learner, for example:</p>
                    <ul>
                      <li>a researcher requiring Malay for field trips</li>
                      <li>a member of staff working to revive  GCSE/A-level/degree level French</li>
                      <li>an undergraduate linguist wishing to improve listening skills</li>
                      <li>a postgraduate needing to read German for academic purposes</li>
                    </ul>
                    <p> Whatever your language interests, level or aims, we are keen to meet you  and help with structuring a path towards your learning goals.   If you would  like a conversation to identify the learning strategies and strengths that will  help motivate your studies, as well as find methods for tackling weaker areas,  come and explore the support available in our learning centre. </p>
                    Rather  than focusing on language-specific expertise, we are concerned with your learning  method: the psychology of having one can transform a language ambition into an  enjoyable commitment that is flexible, achievable, and different from one  person to the next.
                    <hr>
                    <a href="http://www.training.cam.ac.uk/lc/course/lc-jtc_Advice" class="campl-float-right" ><img class="campl-float-right" src="../images/content/join.png" alt="Book"></a>
                    <h2 id="2">One-to-one appointments</h2>
<p>Come for a  half hour meeting any time you would like. </p>
			
   <ul>
     <ul>
	        <ul>
	          <li>
	            Decide on your short term and longer term goals</li>
              </li>
	          <li>Formulate a learning plan</li>
	          <li>Evaluate progress and identify your next steps</li>
	          <li>Discuss language learning strategies </li>
	          <li>Explore resources in specialist areas</li>
	          <li>Consider how the Centre's taught courses fit in to medium term plans</li>
	          <li>Find out more about intensive language courses abroad</li>
	        </ul>
	    </ul>
   </ul>
   <hr><a href="http://www.training.cam.ac.uk/lc/theme/JTC?unscheduled=true&providerId=399495" class="campl-float-right" target="_blank" ><img class="campl-float-right" src="../images/content/join.png" alt="Book"></a>
   <h2 id="3">Workshops</h2>
                    <p>We are in  the process of developing a series of workshops to explore language learning  strategies for specific purposes. </p>
<hr><a href="https://www.training.cam.ac.uk/lc/course/lc-jtc_Languagestudygroup" class="campl-float-right" target="_blank" ><img class="campl-float-right" src="../images/content/join.png" alt="Book"></a>
                    <h2 id="4">Language Study Group</h2>
                    <p>Language learners unite! If you enjoy learning in company or would  benefit from having a slot in your calendar set aside for language study,  please join us.  </p>
                    <p>Drop us a line at <a href="mailto:enquiries@langcen.cam.ac.uk">enquiries@langcen.cam.ac.uk</a> if you would like to join our mailing list.</p>
<hr>
				  </div>
				</div>
<!-- Secondary content / Quick links start -->

 				<div class="campl-content-container">             
                <div class="campl-column12">
                      <div class="campl-content-container campl-no-left-padding">
                        <blockquote class="clearfix">
                          <p class="campl-quote-mark">Give learners language and that will keep them going for a day. <br>Explore language learning strategies with them and that will keep them going for a lifetime.</p>
                        <cite>The Advising Team</cite></blockquote>
                      </div>
                      <hr>
                  </div>
                <div class="campl-column12">
                  <div class="campl-content-container campl-no-left-padding">

                      <p class="campl-quote-mark">I can't thank you enough for the support provided throughout the year - I don't think I would have worked so hard had it not been for your tips and cookies.<br>
                      </p>
                      <cite>Language Study Group Student</cite></blockquote>

							<a href="">CB2 3EL</a>

<!-- Main content starts -->	
				<div class="campl-column6  campl-main-content" id="content">
				  <img src="../images/content/recessed-image-placeholder41.jpg" alt="Conversation Exchange" class="campl-scale-with-grid" />
				  <div class="campl-content-container">
				    <h2>Conversation hours</h2>
<p>Groups meet for six sessions during <strong>Michaelmas</strong> and <strong>Lent terms</strong> (and during Easter term subject to demand) to discuss topics of cultural, international or general interest. Each group is  led by a native speaker who is there to help sustain momentum in conversation, encourage  debate and support with feedback on language. These are informal groups for  those who have independent conversational ability but would like to develop the  range and quality of their self-expression. </p>
<p>In the <strong>French</strong>, <strong>German</strong> and <strong>Spanish Conversation  Hours</strong> learners take it in turns to select a conversation topic, send round a  web link to some pre-reading/listening material and draw up a short list of  simple questions for small group discussion during the session.</p>
<p>The <strong>English</strong> groups are led by one of our <strong>ADTIS teachers</strong> and are available at Intermediate and Advanced level.</p>
<p>University students, staff, their partners and  visiting scholars all welcome.</p>
                    <p><span class="campl-icon campl-info-icon"></span>We charge <strong>a small fee</strong> for these sessions; please click "<strong>join</strong>" to find out more.</p>
                    <table class="campl-table-bordered campl-table-striped campl-table campl-vertical-stacking-table">
                      <thead>

                    <p><span class="campl-icon campl-info-icon"></span>For information about the CEF levels referred to in the language details please check the <a href="CEF_sa_grid.pdf" target="_blank"><strong>CEFR Self Assessment Grid</strong></a>.</p>
   <hr />
   <a  class="campl-float-right" href="#top"><img class="camp1-btn" src="../images/interface/bg-vertical-breadcrumb-up-arrow.png" alt="Back to top"></a>
   <a href="conversation-exchange-guidelines.html" class="campl-float-right" target="_self" ><img class="campl-float-right" src="../images/content/join.png" alt="Guidelines"></a>
   <h2>Conversation Exchange</h2>
   <h3>Learners of any language, level or age, join and...</h3>
   <ul>
     <ul>
       <ul>
         <li>speak the language you are learning with a  native speaker.</li>
         <li>plan your own practice sessions in informal  settings of your choice.</li>
         <li>help someone learn your mother tongue.</li>
       </ul>
     </ul>
   </ul>
   <hr>
   <h3>FAQs</h3>
   <ul>
     <ul>
       <li><span class="campl-quote-mark"><strong>How does the Conversation Exchange work?</strong></span><strong> You email the person</strong> and decide between you when to meet, where, for how  long and how frequently.</li>
       <li><strong>Is it free?</strong> <strong>Yes!</strong></li>
       <li><span class="campl-quote-mark"><strong>When  does it end? </strong></span><strong>If you wish to discontinue your Conversation Exchange</strong>, inform the  Conversation Exchange co-ordinator so a new match can be found for your partner.</li>
       <li><strong>Is  it conversation only? You and your partner structure your own meetings</strong>.  Informal conversation is the main aim, but  you may choose to incorporate other activities that assist with each other’s learning  in a reciprocal way.</li>
       <li><strong>I don't live in Cambridge, could I do an online Conversation Exchange?</strong> <strong>Unfortunately, the majority of our learners prefer not to do this</strong>,   as they  feel they benefit more from a face to face exchange.</li>
       </ul>
       </ul>
     <hr />
     <a class="campl-float-right" href="#top"><img class="camp1-btn" src="../images/interface/bg-vertical-breadcrumb-up-arrow.png" alt="Back to top"></a>
     <h2>Friends without Frontiers</h2>
     <p>A team of native speaker volunteers who will practice conversation and/or pronunciation in a language you are learning.</p>
     <p>Very informal and friendly, the volunteers offer 20-minute  sessions suitable for any level of learner.</p>
     <p><strong>Languages currently available:</strong></p>

	        <div class="campl-content-container">
	          <h1 class="campl-sub-title">Plan some intensive language study abroad</h1>

<!-- Local side nav bar starts -->	
	
		<div class="campl-row campl-content campl-recessed-content">
			<div class="campl-wrap clearfix">
				<div class="campl-column3">
					<div class="campl-tertiary-navigation">
						<div class="campl-tertiary-navigation-structure">
						<ul class="campl-unstyled-list campl-vertical-breadcrumb">
							<li><a href="../index.html">The Language Centre <span class="campl-vertical-breadcrumb-indicator"></span></a></li>
						</ul>	                        
							<ul class="campl-unstyled-list campl-vertical-breadcrumb-navigation">	
								<li class="campl-selected"><a href="#">Advice and Learning</a>
									<ul class='campl-unstyled-list campl-vertical-breadcrumb-children'>
                        				<li><a href="advising-index.html">Overview</a></li>                                    
									 	<li><a href="learning.html">Discuss your learning</a></li>
                                        <li><a href="speaking-practice.html">Speaking Practice</a></li>
										
							<li><a href="fieldwork.html">Language for Fieldwork</a></li>
							
										<li><a href="explore-resources.html">Explore resources</a></li>
										<li class="campl-selected"><a href="#">Study abroad</a></li>
										<li><a href="volunteer.html">Volunteer your help</a></li> 
									</ul>
								</li>

							</ul>

<!-- Local side nav bar ends -->
<!-- Main content starts -->	
				<div class="campl-column6  campl-main-content"  id="content">
				  <img src="../images/content/recessed-image-placeholder20.jpg" alt="Study abroad" class="campl-scale-with-grid" />
				  <div class="campl-content-container">
		            <h2>Where would you like to go?</h2>
		            <p>Intensive study abroad can give you the ideal opportunity to  immerse yourself in a language, as well as the chance to travel and experience  a new country and its culture.  Students  often look back on these trips as some of their most formative and memorable  experiences, personally speaking as well as linguistically.  We are keen to give you the information and  encouragement to join them.</p>
		            <p>Choosing a short course abroad can be both exciting and  daunting, which is why it helps to fully research your options. There are  several aspects to consider and it’s important to make an informed decision to  make the most of the experience.
 				    <div class="campl-content-container campl-no-left-padding">
 				      <blockquote class="clearfix">
 				        <p class="campl-quote-mark">Mastering languages and studying abroad can change who you are in wonderful ways. Research has shown that learning languages strengthens cognitive skills, including problem solving and mental flexibility, while studying abroad also builds independence and confidence.</p>
			          <cite>The School of Arts and Humanities and the School of Social Sciences</cite></blockquote>
			        </div><p>You may like to consider one of the following.</p><a class="campl-float-right" href="http://www.training.cam.ac.uk/lc/course/lc-jtc_SAbroad">
<img class="campl-float-right" alt="Study abroad appointments" src="../images/content/join.png">
</a>
                    <h2>Appointments</h2>                    
                   <p>These offer you the chance to discuss your plans and find out about course and funding options.</p>
                
                    <hr> <a class="campl-float-right" href="http://www.training.cam.ac.uk/lc/course/lc-jtc_SAbroadWorkshop" ><img class="campl-float-right" src="../images/content/join.png" alt="Study abroad workshops"></a>
					<h2>Workshops</h2>                   
                    <p>These sessions help you to:</p>
                    <ul>
                    <ul>
                      <ul>                    
                        <li>become aware of the different courses available</li>
                        <li>consider related areas such as accommodation options, funding, practicalities.</li>
                        <li>most importantly select a course with the content and level of challenge that's right for you. </li>
                      </ul>
                    </ul>
                    </ul>
                    <hr>
                    <p><span class="campl-icon campl-info-icon"></span><strong>Drop in to our reception area</strong> to find out more about courses and previous student experiences.</p>
                    <p><span class="campl-icon campl-info-icon"></span>If you are a scientist, <a href="http://www.langcen.cam.ac.uk/lc/bursaries/pressland.html"><strong>consider applying for a Pressland Bursary</strong></a> to help you with your plans. </p>
                  </div>
				</div>
<!-- Secondary content / Quick links start -->

<!-- Main content starts -->	
				<div class="campl-column6  campl-main-content" id="content">
				  <img src="../images/content/recessed-image-placeholder25.jpg" alt="Explore resources" class="campl-scale-with-grid" />
				  <div class="campl-content-container">				        
				    <p><em>There are three ways to support other learners.</em></p>
				    <!--<a class="campl-float-right" href="http://www.training.cam.ac.uk/lc/theme/JTC?providerId=399495" ><img class="campl-float-right" src="../images/content/join.png" alt="Language Volunteer Bank"></a> -->
				    <h2>Language Volunteer Bank</h2>
   <p><em>Would you like to volunteer your language skills for<strong> short  term </strong>help? </em></p>
   <p> From time to time we have requests from staff and students looking to:</p>
   <ul>
     <ul>
       <ul>
         <ul>
           <li>Understand the basics of a language for fieldwork/research purposes</li>
           <li>Gain occasional conversation practice</li>
           <li>Make a quick uncertified translation of a short article</li>
         </ul>
         </ul>
       </ul>
     </ul>
   <p>Volunteering means that you are happy to help, if and when  another University member is looking to practise your native language.</p>
<p>Recently we helped a PhD student learning the  basics of Yoruba and matched him with a fellow student for gleaning simple  information about the language. We have  also had a fantastic volunteer for Igbo, who has given occasional support over the past couple of years to postgraduate students.</p>
<p><span class="campl-icon campl-info-icon"></span>If you can volunteer your help please contact <a href="mailto:enquiries@langcen.cam.ac.uk">enquiries@langcen.cam.ac.uk.</a></p>
<hr \>
				  <h2><strong>Friends without Frontiers</strong></h2>
				  <p><em>Could you give an hour of your time <strong>each week </strong>to support  learners on a 1-to-1 basis with your native language?</em></p>
				  <p>We would like to encourage friendships across countries and cultures by inviting native speakers to volunteer to help others. This could  involve helping somebody to practise or offering feedback that supports them to improve. At the same time the volunteer can gain initial experience in learner  support that would be useful for a career in education or a related field.</p>
				  <p><span class="campl-icon campl-info-icon"></span>If you could be a friend to a learner please contact <a href="mailto:enquiries@langcen.cam.ac.uk">enquiries@langcen.cam.ac.uk</a>.</p>
				  <hr \>
				  <h2>Make a recording</h2>
				  <p><em>Would you be able to help us with recordings?</em></p>
				  <p>These can be useful for our CULP listening exams and  occasionally we may be looking for volunteers to make recordings in our course  languages.</p>
				  <p>For some of our lesser known languages it can be difficult to find spoken representation and having recordings is very useful to learners  for initial exposure and training the ear. </p>
<p><span class="campl-icon campl-info-icon"></span>If you would like to be added to our recording volunteer list please contact <a href="mailto:enquiries@langcen.cam.ac.uk">enquiries@langcen.cam.ac.uk</a>.</p>
				  <hr \>
				  </div>
				</div>

	<div class="campl-wrap clearfix campl-page-sub-title campl-recessed-sub-title">
	  <div class="campl-column3 campl-spacing-column"> &nbsp; </div>
	  <div class="campl-column9">
	    <div class="campl-content-container">
	      <h1 class="campl-sub-title">Bursaries for Graduate Language Training</h1>
        </div>
      </div>

<!-- Local side nav bar starts -->	
	
		<div class="campl-row campl-content campl-recessed-content">
			<div class="campl-wrap clearfix">
				<div class="campl-column3">
					<div class="campl-tertiary-navigation">
						<div class="campl-tertiary-navigation-structure">
						<ul class="campl-unstyled-list campl-vertical-breadcrumb">
							<li><a href="../index.html">The Language Centre <span class="campl-vertical-breadcrumb-indicator"></span></a></li>
						</ul>	                        
							<ul class="campl-unstyled-list campl-vertical-breadcrumb-navigation">	
								<li class="campl-selected"><a href="#">Bursaries & Grants</a>
									<ul class='campl-unstyled-list campl-vertical-breadcrumb-children'>
										<li><a href="general.html">General Information</a></li>
										<li><a href="#" class="campl-selected">Bursaries for Graduate Language Training</a></li>
										<li><a href="pressland.html">Pressland Fund</a></li>
										<li><a href="grants.html">Grants & Scholarships</a></li>
									</ul>
								</li>

							</ul>

					</div>
				</div>
<!-- Local side nav bar ends -->
<!-- Main content starts -->	
				<div class="campl-column6  campl-main-content">
				  <img src="../images/content/recessed-image-placeholder16.jpg" title="© Graduation 2013 1 by Selwyn College Alumni Flickr Album" alt="https://www.flickr.com/photos/selalum/9183242442/in/set-72157634420330533/" class="campl-scale-with-grid" />
				  <div class="campl-content-container">
  <h2>Language learning opportunities for graduate students</h2>
		      		<p>Some language training for graduate students (the <a href="../culp/culp-specialist-courses.html"><strong>Academic Reading courses</strong></a> for students in the Schools of Arts &amp; Humanities and Humanities &amp; Social Sciences) is <strong>free </strong>at the point of delivery and no bursary application is required. </p>
		      		<p>The Language Centre administers a bursary scheme for graduate students in the Schools of Arts &amp; Humanities and Humanities &amp; Social Sciences. These are available to support access to <a href="../culp/culp-index.html"><strong>CULP</strong></a> courses and external training in various forms. More information on this scheme can be found on the <a href="../graduates/funding-opportunities.html"><strong>Graduate Language Training pages</strong></a>, including guidance on eligibility, deadline dates for applications and a link to the application form. <br>
  <br>
		      		  Some graduate students may be entitled to further language training financial support from other funding sources including Doctoral Training Centres administered by the University with funding from Research Funding Councils. Graduate students should enquire within their own Departments or Faculties for sources of such funds.
		      		  <!-- Secondary content / Quick links start -->	                
	      		    </p>
                  </div>
				</div>
				<div class="campl-column3 campl-secondary-content">
				<div class="campl-content-container">
					<div class="campl-heading-container">

		<h2>We are sorry but the page you are looking for is no longer available.</h2>
		<p>This may be because there has been some recent reorganisation of this website. Please go to the Language Centre <a href="lc/index.html"><strong>Home page</strong></a> or follow the links above to the appropriate section of the website to locate the information you require.</p>

            	<div class="campl-content-container">

		<h2>We are sorry but the page you are looking for is no longer available.</h2>
		<p>This may be because there has been some recent reorganisation of this website. Please go to the Language Centre <a href="lc/index.html"><strong>Home page</strong></a> or follow the links above to the appropriate section of the website to locate the information you require.</p>

                        <li><a href="https://www.vle.cam.ac.uk/course/index.php?categoryid=3301" target="_blank">Moodle</a></li>                                                 
		    	    	
						<li><a href="http://www.mml.cam.ac.uk/" target="_blank">MML</a></li>
						<li><a href="http://www.ames.cam.ac.uk/" target="_blank">AMES</a></li>                                              
				    	<li><a href="http://www.cam.ac.uk/about-the-university/term-dates-and-calendars" target="_blank">University Term Dates</a></li>

					</ul>
					</div>
			  </div>
			</div>
         </div>

<!--Content starts / Horizontal teasers -->    
<div class="campl-row campl-content campl-recessed-content" >
  <div class="campl-wrap clearfix">
			<div class="campl-column6 campl-main-content">
			  <div class="campl-content-container campl-sub-column-right-border"> 
				<div class="campl-horizontal-teaser campl-teaser clearfix"> 
						<div class="campl-column6">
							<div class="campl-content-container campl-horizontal-teaser-img">
								<a href="about/about.html" class="campl-teaser-img-link"><img alt="The Language Centre"  src="images/content/lc-about.jpg" class="campl-scale-with-grid" /></a>
							</div>
						</div>
						<div class="campl-column6">
							<div class="campl-content-container campl-horizontal-teaser-txt">
								<h2 class='campl-teaser-title'><a href="about/about.html">The Language Centre</a></h2>
							  <p>The Language Centre supports the teaching and learning of languages throughout the University. It does so flexibly in accordance with the needs of its users; it uses IT to underpin its operations and its activities are informed by relevant research in second language acquisition and educational technology.</p>
								<a href="about/about.html" class="campl-primary-cta">Read more</a>
							</div>
						</div>
				  </div>
				</div>
				<hr class="campl-teaser-divider" />
				<div class="campl-content-container campl-sub-column-right-border"> 
					<div class="campl-horizontal-teaser campl-teaser clearfix"> 
						<div class="campl-column6">
							<div class="campl-content-container campl-horizontal-teaser-img">
								<a href="advising/learning.html" class="campl-teaser-img-link"><img alt=""  src="images/content/image-placeholder-04.jpg" class="campl-scale-with-grid" /></a>
							</div>
						</div>
						<div class="campl-column6">
						  <div class="campl-content-container campl-horizontal-teaser-txt">
						    <h2 class="campl-teaser-title"><a href="advising/learning.html">Advice &amp;&nbsp;Learning </a></h2>
						    <p>The Advising Team are here to support you on a one-to-one basis, exploring resources and opportunities to structure a path towards your personal language learning goals. We are most interested in helping you identify the strengths and   learning preferences that will motivate your language study, as well as   find strategies for tackling weaker areas. </p>
								  <a href="advising/learning.html" class="campl-primary-cta">Read more</a>                               
							</div>
						</div>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="campl-content-container campl-sub-column-right-border">
				  <div class="campl-horizontal-teaser campl-teaser clearfix">
				    <div class="campl-column6">
				      <div class="campl-content-container campl-horizontal-teaser-img"> <a href="advising/learning.html" class="campl-teaser-img-link"></a><a href="teaching-programmes.html" class="campl-teaser-img-link"><img alt=""  src="images/content/image-placeholder-06.jpg" class="campl-scale-with-grid" /></a> </div>
			        </div>
				    <div class="campl-column6">
				      <div class="campl-content-container campl-horizontal-teaser-txt">
				        <h2 class="campl-teaser-title"><a href="advising/learning.html">Teaching Programmes</a></h2>
				        <p>The Language Centre provides a range of courses in fifteen languages, including English, for students and staff of the University; in addition to offering teaching directly to specific Faculties or Departments. </p>
<p><a href="culp/culp-index.html">Cambridge University Language Programmes (CULP)</a><br>
				          <a href="adtis/adtis-index.html">Academic Development and Training for International Students (ADTIS)</a><br>
			            </p>
				        <a href="teaching-programmes.html" class="campl-primary-cta">Read more</a> </div>
			        </div>
			      </div>
			  </div>
<!--Horizontal teasers end --> 
<!-- Vertical teasers start -->   				
				<hr class="campl-teaser-divider" />
				<div class="campl-content-container campl-sub-column-right-border clearfix campl-vertical-padding">
					<div class="campl-column6">
						<div class="campl-content-container campl-side-padding">
							<div class="campl-vertical-teaser campl-teaser"> 
								<div class="campl-content-container campl-vertical-teaser-img">
									<a href="opencourseware/opencourseware-index.html" class="campl-teaser-img-link">
										<img alt="Open Courseware"  src="images/content/op-focus.png" class="campl-scale-with-grid" />
									</a>
						    </div>
								<div class="campl-content-container campl-vertical-teaser-txt">
								  <h3 class="campl-teaser-title"><a href="opencourseware/opencourseware-index.html">Open Courseware</a></h3>
								  <p>To support language learning, the Language Centre is making a range of its language learning resources available as open courseware under the Creative Commons Licence. </p>
								  <p><a href="opencourseware/opencourseware-index.html">The Language Centre Open Courseware </a></p>
								</div>
							</div>
						</div>
					</div>
					<div class="campl-column6">
						<div class="campl-content-container campl-sub-column-left-border campl-side-padding">
							<div class="campl-vertical-teaser campl-teaser"> 
								<div class="campl-content-container campl-vertical-teaser-img">
									<a href="advising/explore-resources.html" class="campl-teaser-img-link">
										<img alt="Independent Learning"  src="images/content/image-placeholder-03.jpg" class="campl-scale-with-grid" />
									</a>
							  </div>
								<div class="campl-content-container campl-vertical-teaser-txt">
									<h3 class='campl-teaser-title'><a href="advising/explore-resources.html">Independent Learning</a></h3>
								  <p>The John Trim Centre (JTC) houses resources in over 170 languages from beginner to advanced level, and staff are available to help and guide users in their choice of materials. </p>
									<p><a href="advising/explore-resources.html">The John Trim Centre for independent language learning</a>                                
                                    </p>
                                </div>
							</div>
						</div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
<!-- Vertical teasers end -->
<!-- 3rd column start -->           
			<div class="campl-column3">
				<div class="campl-content-container campl-sub-column-left-border campl-main-content-sub-column">
				  <div class="campl-heading-container">
				    <h2>Languages in the news</h2>
				  </div>
			  </div>  
			   <div class="campl-content-container campl-no-top-padding campl-sub-column-left-border campl-main-content-sub-column">
<div class="campl-listing-item campl-news-listing clearfix">
  <p class="campl-listing-title"><a href="https://www.varsity.co.uk/comment/14192" title="Varsity News" target="_blank">Studying languages in post-Brexit Britain will become even less accessible</a></p>
  <span class="campl-datestamp">29 November 2017</span>
  <p>Galaxy Henry talks about the problem of underprivilege in learning languages other than English, and why we should appreciate them enough to keep them alive.</p>
</div>
<div class="campl-listing-item campl-news-listing clearfix">
  <p class="campl-listing-title"><a href="http://www.springer.com/gb/book/9783319651682" title="Springer Books" target="_blank">'Languages after Brexit - How the UK Speaks to the World'</a></p>
  <span class="campl-datestamp">06 November 2017</span>
  <p>New topical book including a chapter from our Director Jocelyn Wyburd: 'Building Capacity in UK Higher Education', pp 173-183.&nbsp;Represents the definitive assessment of the UK’s language needs and capabilities as the country faces up to Brexit.</p>
</div>
<div class="campl-listing-item campl-news-listing clearfix">
  <p class="campl-listing-title"><a href="http://www.cam.ac.uk/news/cambridge-launches-student-vlog-competition" title="Cambridge University" target="_blank">Cambridge launches student vlog competition </a></p>
  <span class="campl-datestamp">03 October 2017</span>
  <p>Cambridge is on the hunt for its best student vlogger with £200 of video kit and expert mentoring up for grabs. </p>
</div>
<div class="campl-listing-item campl-news-listing clearfix">
  <p class="campl-listing-title"><a href="http://www.cam.ac.uk/news/new-vice-chancellor-for-cambridge-0" title="Cambridge University" target="_blank">New Vice-Chancellor for Cambridge</a></p>
  <span class="campl-datestamp">02 October 2017</span>
  <p>Professor Stephen Toope became the 346th Vice-Chancellor of the University of Cambridge, succeeding Professor Sir Leszek Borysiewicz.</p>
</div>
<div class="campl-listing-item campl-news-listing clearfix">
  <p class="campl-listing-title"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l5KpyMR5q3o" title="Cambridge University YouTube" target="_blank">Students tips on getting started at Cambridge University</a></p>
  <span class="campl-datestamp">17 August 2017</span>
  <p>We met up with some Cambridge University vloggers to find out what it's really like to study at Cambridge, and also get some insiders’ advice for students starting next term. </p>
</div>
<div class="campl-listing-item campl-news-listing clearfix">
  <p class="campl-listing-title"><a href="http://www.hefce.ac.uk/tefoutcomes/#/provider/10007788" title="HEFCE Link" target="_blank">Year Two results of the Teaching Excellence Framework ('TEF2')</a></p>
  <span class="campl-datestamp">22 June 2017</span>
  <p>The University of Cambridge has been given a Gold Award for its performance in TEF2, the highest award available to participating universities. </p>
</div>
<div class="campl-listing-item campl-news-listing clearfix">
  <p class="campl-listing-title"><a href="https://medium.com/this-cambridge-life/the-linguist-exploring-questions-of-love-and-loss-3c9a0d8a859f" title="Medium Link" target="_blank">The linguist exploring questions of love and loss</a></p>
  <span class="campl-datestamp">15 June 2017</span>
  <p>Emma Wilson remembers waiting in an icy corridor for her admissions interview at Newnham College, a place she describes as “exactly right for me”. </p>
</div>
<p><a href="news-archive.html" class="campl-secondary-cta campl-float-right ">View all news</a></p>
			  </div>
		
			</div>

        <p class="campl-listing-title"><strong>Graduate students in Arts, Humanities and Social Sciences</strong></p>
        <div class="campl-content-container campl-vertical-teaser-txt clearfix">
    <p>Opportunity to apply for a bursary for language training.<br>
    </p>
    <div class="campl-content-container campl-vertical-teaser-txt clearfix"> <a href="graduates/funding-opportunities.html" target="_blank" class="campl-secondary-cta campl-float-right">Read more</a> </div>
	</div>

		        <h1>Chinese</h1>
                  <a name="bottom"></a>
		            <ul id="navTabs" class="campl-nav campl-nav-tabs campl-unstyled-list">
		              <li class="active"><a href="#item-1" data-toggle="tab">Basic</a></li>
		              <li><a href="#item-2" data-toggle="tab">Intermediate</a></li>
		            </ul>
		            <div id="tabContent" class="tab-content">
						<div class="tab-pane fade in active" id="item-1">
						  <div class="campl-content-container">
						    <h1>Chinese&nbsp;Basic</h1>
						    <h2>Overview</h2>
		              <p>This is a <strong>twofold web-application</strong> developed by the University of Cambridge Language Centre for basic level students of Chinese. It focuses on listening and reading skills and it also includes many activities that help learners prepare for speaking and writing. </p>
     
                <h2>Screenshots</h2>
		              <p>Click on an image to view the full size version and keep on clicking to navigate through all  the other full-size images.</p>
<table summary="" class="campl-table-bordered campl-table-striped campl-table  campl-vertical-stacking-table">
		                <tbody>
		                  <tr>
		                    <td ><div class="single" align="center"><a href="cb/cb1-lg-1.jpg" data-lightbox="image-1" title="Basic Chinese 1"><img src="cb/cb1-thumb-1.jpg" alt="" align="middle"  class="campl-scale-with-grid" /></a></div></td>
		                      <td ><div class="single" align="center"><a href="cb/cb1-lg-2.jpg" data-lightbox="image-1" title="Basic Chinese 1"><img src="cb/cb1-thumb-2.jpg" alt="" align="middle"  class="campl-scale-with-grid" /></a></div></td>
		                      <td ><div class="single" align="center"><a href="cb/cb1-lg-3.jpg" data-lightbox="image-1" title="Basic Chinese 1"><img src="cb/cb1-thumb-3.jpg" alt="" align="middle"  class="campl-scale-with-grid" /></a></div></td>
		                      <td ><div class="single" align="center"><a href="cb/cb1-lg-4.jpg" data-lightbox="image-1" title="Basic Chinese 1"><img src="cb/cb1-thumb-4.jpg" alt="" align="middle"  class="campl-scale-with-grid" /></a></div></td>
	                      </tr>
	                    </tbody>
                </table>
                <h2>FAQ</h2>
                <table summary="" class="campl-table-bordered campl-table-striped campl-table  campl-vertical-stacking-table">
                      <tbody>
                        <tr>
                          <th scope="row" >Q:</th>
                          <td><em>What computer do I need to run the web-application?</em></td>
                        </tr>
                        <tr>
                          <th scope="row" >A:</th>
                          <td><ul>
                            <li>A computer with a recent webbrowser (Firefox 3.0, Internet Explorer or later) and Flash 9.0 or later.</li>
                            <li>Headphones are recommended.</li>
                          </ul></td>
                        </tr>
                        <tr>
                          <th scope="row" >Q: </th>
                          <td><em>How do I start the <strong>Chinese Basic </strong>application?</em></td>
                        </tr>
                        <tr>
                          <th scope="row" >A:</th>
                          <td><ul>
                            <li>Unzip the files into a folder.</li>
                            <li>Open the folder called 'Basic1' and load the <em>index.html</em> file into a browser (Firefox is probably best, or any recent browser) and then follow the navigation from there.</li>
                            <li>To make it easier for future access create a shortcut to the <em>index.html</em> file.</li>
                          </ul></td>
                        </tr>
                  </tbody>
                </table>
          <h2>Contact us</h2>
		              <p>Please make sure you have read the FAQ before you contact us.</p>
                <p>Email: <a href="mailto:opencourseware@langcen.cam.ac.uk">opencourseware@langcen.cam.ac.uk</a></p>

              	    <div class="tab-pane fade" id="item-2">
					  <div class="campl-content-container">
                <h1>Intermediate Chinese</h1>
                <h2>Overview</h2>
		              <p>This is a <b>web-application</b> developed by the University of Cambridge Language Centre for intermediate level students of Chinese. The material is function-based and presented through nine themes, each based on 3 or 4 audio dialogues. Comprehension of each dialogue is supported by vocabulary help, transcript (in Chinese characters with optional pinyin access), translation, language notes and comprehension activities. There are also notes on cultural background, language functions, grammar notes, practice activities, reading material and a self-test to help learners evaluate their progress.</p>
		              <p>Please Read the <span class="campl-icon campl-pdf-icon"></span> <a href="CI_ReadMeFirst.pdf" class="campl-icon-link" target="_blank">Read Me First</a>  file. </p>
<h2>Screenshots</h2>
<p>Click on each image to view its full size version.</p>
<div id="gallery">
<table summary="" class="campl-table-bordered campl-table-striped campl-table  campl-vertical-stacking-table">
		                <tbody>
		                  <tr>
		                    <td ><div align="center"><a href="ci/ss1.jpg" data-lightbox="image-1" title="Intermediate Chinese"><img src="ci/ss1_thumb.png" alt=""  align="middle"  class="campl-scale-with-grid" /></a></div></td>
		                    <td><div align="center"><a href="ci/ss_dand.jpg" data-lightbox="image-1" title="Drag and Drop Activity"><img src="ci/ss_dand_thumb.png" alt=""  align="middle" class="campl-scale-with-grid" /></a></div></td>
		                    <td><div align="center"><a href="ci/ss_ci_dialogue.jpg" data-lightbox="image-1" title="Intermediate Chinese - Dialogue"><img src="ci/ss_ci_dialogue_thumb.png" alt=""  align="middle"  class="campl-scale-with-grid" /></a></div></td>
		                    <td><div align="center"><a href="ci/ss_ci_cm.jpg" data-lightbox="image-1" title="Flash Activity"><img src="ci/ss_ci_cm_thumb.png" alt=""  align="middle"  class="campl-scale-with-grid" /></a></div></td>
	                      </tr>
	                    </tbody>
                </table>
                </div>
                <h2>FAQ</h2>
                <table summary="" class="campl-table-bordered campl-table-striped campl-table  campl-vertical-stacking-table">
                      <tbody>
                        <tr>
                          <th scope="row" >Q:</th>
                          <td><em>What computer do I need to run the web-application?</em></td>
                        </tr>
                        <tr>
                          <th scope="row" >A:</th>
                          <td><ul>
                            <li>A computer with a recent webbrowser (Firefox 3.0, Internet Explorer or later) and Flash 9.0 or later.</li>
                            <li>Headphones are recommended.</li>
                          </ul></td>
                        </tr>
                        <tr>
                          <th scope="row" >Q: </th>
                          <td><em>How do I start the <strong>Intermediate Chinese</strong> application?</em></td>
                        </tr>
                        <tr>
                          <th scope="row" >A:</th>
                          <td><ul>
                            <li>Unzip the files into a folder.</li>
                            <li>Open the folder and load the <em>index.html</em> file into a browser (Firefox is probably best, or any recent browser) and then follow the navigation from there.</li>
                            <li>To make it easier for future access create a shortcut to the <em>index.html</em> file.</li>
                          </ul></td>
                        </tr>
                  </tbody>
                </table>
                <h2>Contact us</h2>
		              <p>Please make sure you have read the FAQ before you contact us.</p>
                <p>Email: <a href="mailto:opencourseware@langcen.cam.ac.uk">opencourseware@langcen.cam.ac.uk</a></p>
		              <h2>Download	-	Full Program             </h2>
		              <table class="campl-table-bordered campl-table-striped campl-table  campl-vertical-stacking-table">
		                <tbody>
		                  <tr>
                          <td>
		                    <a class="campl-icon-link" href="http://duns.langcen.cam.ac.uk/oc/ci/intchinese.zip"><img src="../../images/interface/lightbox/page_white_compressed.png" alt="Zip file" hspace="10" border="0"><strong>Intermediate Chinese</strong></a> (1GB)
                            </td>
                        </tr>
		                    <tr>
                            <td>
                            <a class="campl-icon-link" href="CI_ReadMeFirst.pdf" target="_blank"><img src="../../images/interface/lightbox/pdf.png" alt="Zip file" hspace="10" border="0">Read Me First</a></td>
                        </tr>
	                    </tbody>
                </table>
                <p>Because the full Intermediate Chinese program is almost 1GB we are making the themes available as individual downloads.</p>
<h2>Download	-	Themes</h2>
                <p>If you use a theme on its own the '<strong>Home'</strong> button will not work. However if you download the <strong>Top level files with placeholders for themes &lt;intchinese_ntc.zip&gt;</strong> folder<strong> first</strong> you will have all the top level files including the the top level index.html page and a placeholder index.html file inside each of the nine theme folders. </p>
                <p>When you download a theme simply replace the folder with the same name inside the '<strong>content</strong>' folder.</p>
                <table class="campl-table-bordered campl-table-striped campl-table  campl-vertical-stacking-table">
                  <tbody>
                    <tr>
                      <td><a href="http://duns.langcen.cam.ac.uk/oc/ci/intchinese_ntc.zip"><img src="../../images/interface/lightbox/page_white_compressed.png" alt="Zip file" /> <strong>Top level files with placeholders for themes</strong></a> (0.5MB)</td>
                      <td colspan="2"><a href="intchinese_ntc.zip"><img src="../../images/interface/lightbox/page_white_compressed.png" alt="Zip file" /></a><a href="NTC_ReadMe.pdf" target="_new"> <strong>Additional Read Me</strong></a> (for individual themes)</td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td><a href="intchinese_ntc.zip"><img src="../../images/interface/lightbox/page_white_compressed.png" alt="Zip file" /></a><a href="http://duns.langcen.cam.ac.uk/oc/ci/theme1.zip"> <strong>1: First Encounter</strong></a> (96MB)</td>
                      <td><a href="intchinese_ntc.zip"><img src="../../images/interface/lightbox/page_white_compressed.png" alt="Zip file" /></a><a href="http://duns.langcen.cam.ac.uk/oc/ci/theme2.zip"> <strong>2: Induction Day</strong></a> (82MB)</td>
                      <td><a href="intchinese_ntc.zip"><img src="../../images/interface/lightbox/page_white_compressed.png" alt="Zip file" /></a><a href="http://duns.langcen.cam.ac.uk/oc/ci/theme3.zip"> <strong>3: Social Visit</strong></a> (97MB)</td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td><a href="intchinese_ntc.zip"><img src="../../images/interface/lightbox/page_white_compressed.png" alt="Zip file" /></a><a href="http://duns.langcen.cam.ac.uk/oc/ci/theme4.zip"><strong> 4: Managing Finances</strong></a> (104MB)</td>
                      <td><a href="intchinese_ntc.zip"><img src="../../images/interface/lightbox/page_white_compressed.png" alt="Zip file" /></a><a href="http://duns.langcen.cam.ac.uk/oc/ci/theme5.zip"> <strong>5: Looking for a Flat</strong></a> (111MB)</td>
                      <td><a href="intchinese_ntc.zip"><img src="../../images/interface/lightbox/page_white_compressed.png" alt="Zip file" /></a><a href="http://duns.langcen.cam.ac.uk/oc/ci/theme6.zip"> <strong>6: Shopping Experience</strong></a> (97MB)</td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td><a href="intchinese_ntc.zip"><img src="../../images/interface/lightbox/page_white_compressed.png" alt="Zip file" /></a><a href="http://duns.langcen.cam.ac.uk/oc/ci/theme7.zip"><strong> 7: Travelling in China</strong></a> (127MB)</td>
                      <td><a href="intchinese_ntc.zip"><img src="../../images/interface/lightbox/page_white_compressed.png" alt="Zip file"  /></a><a href="http://duns.langcen.cam.ac.uk/oc/ci/theme8.zip"> <strong>8: Seeking Medical Advice</strong></a> (98MB)</td>
                      <td><a href="intchinese_ntc.zip"><img src="../../images/interface/lightbox/page_white_compressed.png" alt="Zip file" /> </a><a href="http://duns.langcen.cam.ac.uk/oc/ci/theme9.zip"><strong>9: Keeping in Contact</strong></a> (111MB)</td>
                    </tr>
                  </tbody>
                </table>

	    <div class="campl-column3 campl-secondary-content">
<div class="campl-content-container">
        <div class="campl-heading-container">
          <h2>Language Learning Resources</h2>
        </div>
        <p>To support language learning the Language Centre is making a range of its <strong>language learning resources available as open courseware</strong> under the <a href="http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/2.0/uk/" target="_new"><strong>Creative Commons Licence</strong></a>. </p>
        <p>The resources can be used for self-study but for their most effective use they will benefit from a learning environment with some face-to-face contact.</p>
        <p><strong><a href="#">There are no taught courses provided here, at the Language Centre, for any of these resources.</a></strong></p>
<p>The Language Centre cannot undertake to provide any support for the resources made available as open courseware.</p>
        <p>Please check the FAQ page for each application for additional information and to contact the maintainers of the software.</p>
        <hr />
<div class="campl-content-container campl-vertical-teaser-txt"><span class="campl-listing-title"><strong><em>New Open Courseware!</em></span><br>
</strong> In <strong><a href="http://www.langcen.cam.ac.uk/lc/opencourseware/chinese/chinese.html">Chinese</a></strong>, <strong><a href="arabic/ae/arabic-essentials.html">Arabic</a></strong>, <strong><a href="german/german.html">German</a></strong>, <strong><a href="italian/italian.html">Italian</a></strong> and <strong><a href="japanese/jlo/japanese-lo.html">Japanese</a>.</strong></div>
<hr>
  <div class="campl-content-container campl-vertical-teaser-txt"><span class="campl-listing-title">Open Courseware Specifications</span> <br>
Please read the information provided. </div>
  <div class="campl-content-container campl-vertical-teaser-txt clearfix">
    <p><a href="oc-specifications.pdf" class="campl-secondary-cta campl-float-right">Read more</a></p>
  </div>
		  </div>
			</div>
         </div>

		<h2>We are sorry but the page you are looking for is no longer available.</h2>
		<p>This may be because there has been some recent reorganisation of this website. Please go to the Language Centre <a href="lc/index.html"><strong>Home page</strong></a> or follow the links above to the appropriate section of the website to locate the information you require.</p>

		<h2>We are sorry but the page you are looking for is no longer available.</h2>
		<p>This may be because there has been some recent reorganisation of this website. Please go to the Language Centre <a href="lc/index.html"><strong>Home page</strong></a> or follow the links above to the appropriate section of the website to locate the information you require.</p>

		<h2>We are sorry but the page you are looking for is no longer available.</h2>
		<p>This may be because there has been some recent reorganisation of this website. Please go to the Language Centre <a href="lc/index.html"><strong>Home page</strong></a> or follow the links above to the appropriate section of the website to locate the information you require.</p>

						<li>
							<a href="https://twitter.com/Cambridge_LC" target="_blank"><img src="lc/images/content/Twitter.png" alt="Twitter" width="16" height="16" longdesc="https://twitter.com/Cambridge_LC">&nbsp;Twitter</a>
						</li>
					</ul>
				</div>
